Package java_source_code_management_tool.view

Class MainFrame

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • java.awt.Window
          • java.awt.Frame
            • javax.swing.JFrame
              • java_source_code_management_tool.view.MainFrame
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.RootPaneContainer, javax.swing.WindowConstants
    public class MainFrame
extends javax.swing.JFrame
    This class consists of view methods related to the display of all panels following the Model-View-Controller pattern.
    Author:
    Jordan and Yanis (Group 4 - Pair 10)
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Detail

      • MainFrame

        public MainFrame​(JavaSourceFileService javaSourceFileService,
                 JavaSourceFileController javaSourceFileController,
                 LoginController loginController,
                 NavigationController navigationController,
                 UserService userService,
                 UserController userController)
        Constructs a new main frame with the specified Java source file service and controller, login controller, navigation controller and user service and controller.
        Parameters:
        javaSourceFileService - the Java source file service acting as a model.
        javaSourceFileController - the Java source file controller.
        loginController - the login controller.
        navigationController - the navigation controller.
        userService - the user service acting as a model.
        userController - the user controller.
